offer_details_1:
Offer: 30% Savings on fresh Vegetables, Fruits, Seafood and Meat at all Keells outlets for bills over Rs. 5,000/- with DFCC Credit Cards.
Offer Period: Every Monday from 02nd to 30th December 2024
Maximum Discount Value: Rs. 1,500/-
Minimum Bill Value: Rs. 5,000/-
Maximum Quantity: 3Kg or 3 units from each item
Validity: Valid only for 01 transaction per cardholder per day
Exempted Items: Packed or processed vegetables, fruits, seafood & meat
Eligible Card Categories: All DFCC Credit Cardholders (excluding DFCC Corporate Credit Cards)
discount: 30% Savings on fresh Vegetables, Fruits, Seafood and Meat at all Keells outlets for bills over Rs. 5,000/- with DFCC Credit Cards.

offer_details_1:
Offer: 10% Savings on the Total Bill at Laugfs Super for bills over Rs. 5,000/- with DFCC Credit Cards.
Offer Period: Every Tuesday from 03rd to 31st December 2024
Maximum Discount Value: Rs. 1,500/-
Minimum Bill Value: Rs 5,000/-
Maximum Quantity: 3kg/ 3 units each from the categories of milk powder, rice, sugar, dhal & flour.
Other Products: Maximum quantity of 3kg/ 3 units per item.
Validity: Valid only for 01 transaction per cardholder per day.
Exempted Items: Liquor, tobacco, pharmaceuticals, existing discounted products, gift vouchers, hampers, gas purchases & utility bill payments.
Eligible Card Categories: All DFCC Credit Cards (excluding DFCC Corporate Credit Cards)
discount: 10% Savings on the Total Bill at Laugfs Super for bills over Rs. 5,000/- with DFCC Credit Cards.

offer_details_1:

Maximum Quantity: 3Kg or 3 units from each eligible item
Exempted Items: Potatoes, coconut, big onion, whole chicken, and packaged vegetables, fruits, seafood, and processed meat.
Validity: Valid only for 01 transaction per cardholder per day
Eligible Card Categories: All DFCC Credit Cardholders (excluding DFCC Corporate Credit Cards)
discount: 30% Savings on Fresh Vegetables, Fruits, Seafood and Meat at Arpico Super Centres and Daily outlets for bills above Rs. 5,000/- with DFCC Credit Cards.

offer_details_1:
